any clue guys? please i tried searching in the search bar but no results..please help...

item.title: Adding new wepon/attack interface tab thingy...?
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“wohuynia, post:14, topic:341082”][quote author=Natey link=topic=437475.msg3216486#msg3216486 date=1274725815]

[quote author=wohuynia link=topic=437475.msg3216459#msg3216459 date=1274722019]

[quote author=Natey link=topic=437475.msg3216397#msg3216397 date=1274716573]

Well, I don’t want to be as much of a bitch as you are, but can you stop being a cunt for one damn moment in your life?

All you do is stroll around these forums posting without reading and being an asshole to everyone.
Lose the fucking attitude, stop thinking your “the shit”, be a little nicer, and you might actually make a friend or two.

Stop worrying about the God damn post count and post helpful information, not useless shit like calling people names.

Otherwise, you will be hated among these forums.
[/quote]Only 2 or 3 people hate me on here, and that’s because they flamed me.
And I post useless shit, god damn right I do! Because posting anything helpful on this forum is like asking to get anything, and everything, you do leeched and stolen.
I also rather like my attitude, and I don’t really care about my post count, last time I checked I had like 800?
And I know I’m “the shit”, thanks for noticing.

Natey you just simply hate me and start to pick on me every post i reply??
If so then that’s childish and your not going to prove anything, you just got in the fight not only with me but now with more people and that’s not going well, i suggest you go take a chill pill and get out of that basement that you call your house and get some fresh air, it help you know.
[/quote]I am chill, idiot.
I’m childish? Too damned bad I’m 16 retard.
Also, try fixing some of your grammar, since you know everything about Java and I know nothing, yet you can’t even spell “you’re” right.
I also do go outside, I do that rather a lot, I got hang out with mates and we smoke and do stupid shit, don’t see how you know me anyway in real life, I suggest you learn a bit about me before saying I sit in my “basement” when all I have is a 1ft crawl space.

You pick on one quad, it’s not a mistake, saying “I’m the shit” sounded funny, I am chill sounded even funnier.
Well you’re stuck on 10 and still a child to me, cause I’m 19, based on your attitude and looking how you behave.

Am i asking anything for the things i help?? No.
I’m doing this cause i like helping and that improves my knowledge in java.
I didn’t saw anything, completely anything that would show that you know java, or anything like it.
[/quote]I don’t use Java for skiddy RSPS, I use it for real games that are my ideas and that weren’t ripped from another game.
And as for more programming I also know c++ and still expanding my knowledge with it.

And your point is??
Rs codes are java, maybe not that what you do but still is java dip stick.
Hm, things i know, PHP, WML, HTML, xHTML, Java, pascal and working on CSS.
Iv learned everything on my own, 30% started from tutorials, 20% read elsewhere, like java code forums, 40% don’t know a shit about java here, other people i assume learned by them self.
So don’t give me that shit that i don’t know java or anything else.[/quote]LOLOLOL RuneScape is programmed in RuneScript!! LLOOLLO!

Read full topic

I also rather like my attitude, and I don’t really care about my post count, last time I checked I had like 800?
And I know I’m “the shit”, thanks for noticing.

Natey you just simply hate me and start to pick on me every post i reply??
If so then that’s childish and your not going to prove anything, you just got in the fight not only with me but now with more people and that’s not going well, i suggest you go take a chill pill and get out of that basement that you call your house and get some fresh air, it help you know.
[/quote]I am chill, idiot.
I’m childish? Too damned bad I’m 16 retard.
Also, try fixing some of your grammar, since you know everything about Java and I know nothing, yet you can’t even spell “you’re” right.
I also do go outside, I do that rather a lot, I got hang out with mates and we smoke and do stupid shit, don’t see how you know me anyway in real life, I suggest you learn a bit about me before saying I sit in my “basement” when all I have is a 1ft crawl space.

You pick on one quad, it’s not a mistake, saying “I’m the shit” sounded funny, I am chill sounded even funnier.
Well you’re stuck on 10 and still a child to me, cause I’m 19, based on your attitude and looking how you behave.

Am i asking anything for the things i help?? No.
I’m doing this cause i like helping and that improves my knowledge in java.
I didn’t saw anything, completely anything that would show that you know java, or anything like it.
[/quote]I don’t use Java for skiddy RSPS, I use it for real games that are my ideas and that weren’t ripped from another game.
And as for more programming I also know c++ and still expanding my knowledge with it.[/quote]
And your point is??
Rs codes are java, maybe not that what you do but still is java dip stick.
Hm, things i know, PHP, WML, HTML, xHTML, Java, pascal and working on CSS.
Iv learned everything on my own, 30% started from tutorials, 20% read elsewhere, like java code forums, 40% don’t know a shit about java here, other people i assume learned by them self.
So don’t give me that shit that i don’t know java or anything else.

item.title: Adding new wepon/attack interface tab thingy...?
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:341241”][quote author=Natey link=topic=437475.msg3216124#msg3216124 date=1274677331]

you need to get this interface, if you don’t have it already,[/b][/size] look in the client.java (server sided) for setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); // attack tab
and change the Interface id to the new interface id.

may you please be more specific, thanks for the help tho

It’s not very possible to more precise.
You need to find this:

setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); // attack tab
and change “2423-interface id” to other interface ID and that’s it, it has been changed ;D
[/quote]That’s if you have the interface added in your client, smart one.

[size=20pt][b]you need to get this interface, if you don’t have it already, look in the client.java (server sided) for setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); // attack tab
and change the Interface id to the new interface id.

Learn to read, smart one.[/quote]Client sided you fuckwit, like the one you play on, fucking idiot.

Read full topic
